app.name: Between us Drivers
app.slogan: The only way to discuss traffic problems

sign-in.email-reset-description: Enter your email and we will send you a reset link
sign-in.terms-conditions-required: You must agree to our terms and conditions
sign-in.data-processing-required: You must agree to us processing your personal data
sign-in.sign-up-create-account-heading: If you don't already have an account, click the button below to create one

sign-up.heading: Sign up
sign-up.body: You are the single step away from registration. Enter statistical information you want to share. Your votes are anonymous in each poll.
sign-up.terms-label: I agree with terms and conditions
sign-up.processing-label: I agree with processing of my personal data
sign-up.notifications-label: I want to recieve email notifications

poll.your-say: What do you want to say about it
